attributes.action: Inform the justice system life to mean life, no parole
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
more and more criminals who take the life off another by either gun crime,knife crime, or rape and murder.
When these criminals are sentenced to life inprisonment they only do 15 to 20 years then they are set free or paroled.
we want life sentence to mean that "LIFE" with no parole,this should include youth murders, young offenders institution, until age 18(all part of the life sentence)  then transfered to adult prison, for there natural life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
